stats.cluster: 300 MH/S CLUSTER: The Fastest Custom Solana Key Generator

security.title: Zero-Custodial Security
security.feature1_desc: VanityForge utilizes a stateless architecture. Private keys are generated in volatile RAM within secure, isolated containers. Once the vanity address is found, it is immediately encrypted. The raw private key never touches a hard drive or database in its unencrypted form.
security.feature2_desc: Before your key leaves the generation container, it is encrypted using Fernet (AES-128-CBC) with a key derived from your Personal Vault PIN using PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256 (100,000 iterations). We do not store your PIN. Without it, the stored encrypted blob is mathematically impossible to decrypt.
security.feature3_desc: Our codebase is open source. The entire generation pipeline, from the Numpad UI to the Rust-based GPU grinder, is verifiable on GitHub. You verify the code, you trust the math.

form.title: Request New Vanity Address
form.note: Note: Characters 0, O, I, and l are not allowed by Solana for security reasons.
form.gpu_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è GPU Worker Cluster is currently updating. Please use CPU.
form.legal: I understand that VanityForge is non-custodial and that losing my PIN means I lose my address forever.

numpad.title: Enter Vault PIN
numpad.warning_text: You are about to create a permanent encryption PIN. VanityForge does not store this PIN. If you lose it, you will permanently lose the capability to reveal your private keys or forge new wallets within your VanityForge account. We cannot recover it for you.
numpad.acknowledge: I acknowledge that VanityForge cannot recover my PIN if lost, and that losing my PIN means I will be unable to reveal my private keys or access my VanityForge account functions.

beta.title: Beta Access Unlocked!
beta.desc: You've received a 50% Discount on all vanity address generations during our Beta phase.
